original: I wake up screaming in the night. The darkness scares me, and I keep wondering how I will last through this campaign.
translation: 我在夜里尖叫着醒来。黑暗令我恐惧，我止不住怀疑我还能在这场战役中撑多久。

original: My soldiers will not respect me.
The Great Khagan has sent more warriors to aid our conquest!
translation: 伟大的可汗派出了更多勇士来帮助我们的征服！

original: I will grant [From.GetObjectPronoun] a claim on the perpetrator's titles.
translation: 我会给[From.GetObjectPronoun]对行凶者头衔的宣称权。

original: Holding is at least $AGE$ years old.\n
Your vassals will think you merciful, increasing their opinion of you by §G$VAL$§!.
translation: 你的封臣会被你的宽大为怀所感动，提高对你的好感§G$VAL$§!。

original: The Burghers are expected to provide half their troops for the defense of the realm.
translation: 市民需要为保卫国土提供他们半数的部队。

original: The Burghers are expected to provide the majority of their troops for the defense of the realm.
translation: 市民需要为保卫国土提供他们大部分的部队。

original: The Burghers are expected to provide almost all their troops for the defense of the realm.
translation: 市民需要为保卫国土提供他们几乎所有的部队。

original: The Burghers are expected to provide all but a tiny part of their troops for the defense of the realm.
translation: 市民需要为保卫国土提供他们所有的部队。

original: Is NOT de jure liege or above
translation: 不是法理领主或更高级领主

original: Is de jure liege or above
translation: 是法理领主或更高级领主

original: Levy at disposal due to laws: §Y$VALUE$%§!
translation: 根据法律可动员的征召军：§Y$VALUE$§!

original: We are allowed to raise the top §Y$PERC$%§W of the levy
translation: 我们可动员征召兵总数的 §Y$PERC$%§W

original: Due to laws(§Y$MAX$%§!) and opinion(§Y$OPINION$%§!), we can raise §Y$PERCENT$%§! of the levy
translation: 由于法律（§Y$MAX$%§!）和好感（§Y$OPINION$%§!），我们可动员征召兵数量的 §Y$PERCENT$%§!

original: However, we are always allowed to raise at least §Y$PERCENT$%§! of the levy
translation: 不过，我们总是能动员至少 §Y$PERCENT$%§! 的征召兵

original: The best I can hope for'
translation: 我能预期到的最好情况

original: Things are certainly going my way'
translation: 胜利的天平正在朝我倾斜

original: I've already won, give up now and I'll spare your life'
translation: 胜利已在我手，现在投降尚可饶你小命
这不过是一点皮肉之伤罢了！

original: I'm losing, but won't give up yet...'
translation: 我正在失利，但我绝不会放弃……

original: The Renaissance sweeps across Europe and the Feudal era draws to a close.
translation: 文艺复兴思潮席卷欧洲，封建时代悄然落下帷幕。

original: After playing $NUMCHARS$ characters, you have lost your last County. $ENDCHAR$ disappears into obscurity...
translation: 在扮演了$NUMCHARS$位君主后，你失去了最后一块伯爵领。末代统治者$ENDCHAR$消失在了历史长河之中……

original: We cannot order an assault since we are not the leader of the siege
translation: 我们不是围攻的主导者，不能发动强攻

original: We can order an assault on the holding, but we might take serious losses if we attempt to do so
translation: 我们可以发动强攻，但可能会损失惨重

original: Time required before attempting assault: §Y$DAYS$§! day(s)
translation: 强攻需要的准备时间：§Y$DAYS$§! 天

original: Base days depending on fort level: §Y$DAYS$§!
translation: 取决于要塞等级的的基础天数：§Y$DAYS$§!

original: Time reduction based on relative army strength: $PERC$
translation: 因兵强马壮而减少的准备时间：$PERC$

original: We need another §Y$DAYS_LEFT$§! days(s) to complete the construction of our siege weapons
translation: 我们还需§Y$DAYS_LEFT$§!天来建造攻城武器

original: This tutorial will introduce you to the most basic parts of what Crusader Kings II is and how you play it.
translation: 本教程将向您介绍《王国风云 II》最基础的部分。

original: Learn about the hierarchy of titles
translation: 了解封建头衔的等次秩序

original: As you can see in the upper right, you have a limit for how many Holdings you can control directly. If you cross this limit, you will get negative effects in the form of tax penalties and your vassals disliking you
translation: 在右上方，你可以看到你能直辖的领地上限。如果你超过了该上限，你会遭到税收惩罚效果，封臣也会变得不喜欢你。

original: To prevent this from happening, make sure you keep under your Demesne limit by handing out landed titles to your vassals. Now, click a County.
translation: 为防止此种情况发生，可通过将领地头衔封给臣下，以确保你的直辖领地不超过上限。请点击一块伯爵领。

original: A County can have different types of Holdings. Depending on what you build in the County, you will get different amounts of tax money, and different kinds of troops from it.
translation: 一块伯爵领可有不同种类的地产。这取决于你在该伯爵领上营造何种地产，不同地产所得到税金和部队类型也不同。

original: The Crown Laws of the §Y$CROWN_TITLE$§! apply in the §Y$TITLE$§!
Hire §Y$TITLE$§W for §Y$COST$§W gold. (They will arrive in or nearby §Y$CAPITAL$§W.)
translation: 花费 §Y$COST$§W 金币雇佣§Y$TITLE$§W。（他们会出现在§Y$CAPITAL$§W或其附近）

original: If the siege is won, the controller of §Y$SETTLEMENT$§! will be the §Y$TITLE$§!
translation: 如果围攻成功，§Y$SETTLEMENT$§!的控制者将会是§Y$TITLE$§!

original: Crusader Kings II takes place on a fully 3D map. You can zoom in and out using your mouse scroll wheel. Holding down the scroll wheel and moving the mouse lets you pan. You can always reset the map by pressing Backspace.
translation: 《王国风云 II》拥有全 3D 的大地图。你可以用鼠标滚轮拉近或拉远镜头，按住鼠标滚轮移动鼠标调整视角。按退格键 Backspace 可以恢复默认视角。

original: §Y$CHILD$§! needs to be at least §Y$AGE$§! years old
Only $NUM$ of $TOTAL$ troops will be able to return home.
translation: 在 $TOTAL$ 名士兵中，只有 $NUM$ 人能返回家乡。

original: Only $NUM$ of $TOTAL$ ships will be able to return home.
translation: 在 $TOTAL$ 艘船中，只有 $NUM$ 艘能返回家乡。

original: Do you wish to dismiss these units?
translation: 确定要解散这些部队吗？

original: $NUM$ units will stand down and return home.
If a combat takes place here, the defender will get a defensive bonus
translation: 如果战斗在此处爆发，防御方将获得防御加成

original: This character had the fortune of being born with a twin. Twins like each other better.
translation: 这名角色有幸生为双胞胎之一，双胞胎之间相互好感更高。

original: To [Root.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Due to your crimes against the True Faith, we can no longer serve you. You should repent and seek guidance from [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]：由于你对真正信仰所犯下的罪行，我等将不再为你所用，你当幡然悔悟，并接受[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的指引。

original: Under Gavelkind Succession Law, you suffer no Prestige penalty for having unlanded sons.
translation: 在均分继承法下，你不会因无地的儿子而受威望惩罚

original: Gavelkind Succession Law allows you to have a larger demesne.
translation: 均分继承法可使你直辖更多领地

original: Employed Holy Orders cost no maintenance when you are defending against heretics or infidels.
translation: 在你抵抗异教徒或异端侵略时，你雇佣的骑士团不花费维护费用。

original: Sacrificed Cattle to Close Gates of Hell
Filled Gates of Hell with Stones
Human Sacrifice Closed Gates of Hell
Show the Holder History for this Title
translation: 显示该头衔的拥有者历史

original: Cannot grant titles to non-vassals when at war
translation: 战争中不能授予非封臣头衔

original: Click to select troops onboard ships

The earth shook, the people screamed and buildings cracked. A cloud of foul-smelling air swept over the village, making torches and fires burn bright green for several hours. It took a couple of days repairing the cracked buildings and salvaging items from the few older houses that had collapsed, luckily everyone escaped unharmed. I slowly walked through the city, examining the buildings and noting what remained to be repaired when an excited peasant approached me. Without bothering with formalities, he told me about a giant crack in the ground just outside his farm. He wanted me to come and inspect it, and perhaps determine what to do about it.
translation: 天摇地动，人民哀嚎，屋毁墙塌。一团秽臭的空气扫过村庄，使得火把和篝火上的火焰变得鲜绿数小时之久。修葺颓圮的建筑、从废墟中抢救财物花费了数日，所幸无人伤亡。我慢慢踱过城市，检视建筑并记录需要修补的目标。此时，一个激动的农夫向我跑来，未及向我行礼，告诉我他农场外出现了一个巨大的裂缝。他希望我去检查一下，并请我决定如何处置。

original: Of course! Show the way, peasant!

The foul smell that had swept over the city the day the earth shook slowly crept up on us and I retched involuntarily. The wound that had burst open in the farmer's field spewed fire and brimstones and we stopped, aghast at the sight. The flames and fiery stones threatened the bare ground around the gap, the farmer was lucky his fields lay fallow.
translation: 天摇地动当日，污秽的气味扫过了城市，慢慢涌向我们，我止不住吐了。农夫的地里撕开了一个裂口，喷出火焰和硫磺，我们为此景吓呆。火焰和炽热的石块焚毁了地缝周围的土地，所幸农夫的田地正在休耕。

original: It's just a hole in the ground
I must take a closer look at this
The Gate and its Tortured Souls

Wailings, screams and cries for help seemed to emit from the burning gap. The farmer grew pale and refused to take one step further. I walked as close to the hell hole as I dared and tried to peek down. Apart from the occasional fiery stone and eyebrow-licking flame, I could see nothing. The wailings and screams seemed to increase until it felt as if my head would explode. I stumbled backward, felt the ground shifting beneath my feet and would have fallen into the pit if the farmer hadn't grabbed my arm and pulled me away from it.
translation: 烈焰翻腾的裂缝底部似乎传来了哀嚎与尖啸。农夫脸色变得苍白，拒绝再向前哪怕一步。我壮着胆子朝那个地狱的口子走近，向下瞄了一眼。除时不时冒出的炽热石块和齐眉的火舌之外，我什么也看不到。哀嚎与尖啸声似乎越来越大，令我头疼欲裂。我仰面跌倒，感到大地在脚下摇晃。如果不是农夫一把抓住我的手把我拉回，我差点就掉进了洞里。

original: I need this gap closed. Now!
There is a way to close the Gap, but how?
translation: 总有办法关上洞的，但要怎么做呢？

original: I gave the wisest men and women of my court three days to come up with a solution on how to close this gap that seemed to open the whole way to hell. Within three days, they all had thought up different solutions to the problem.
translation: 我给了宫廷中最聪明的人三日，来想出关闭这个似乎通往地狱的地缝的方法。三天之内，他们各自想出了不同的方法。

original: The priest will perform an exorcism
The demon inhabiting the gap should be satisfied
translation: 居住在洞里的魔鬼当得到满足

original: Sacrifice the most precious thing in the world
A sacrifice to close the gap

The priest walked several times around the gap, sprinkling holy water and chanting the words 'Vade retro satana! Vade retro satana!', avoiding the fiery stones and flames spewing from the gap as best he could. At the end of the third turn, he knelt and began praying, the only words to be heard 'Vade retro satana!'...
translation: 神父绕着地缝走了好几圈，洒上圣水，重复念诵着「撒殚远离！撒殚远离！」，同时竭力躲避着炽热的石块和喷出的火舌。在第三轮末尾，他跪下开始祈祷，唯一能听清的就是「撒殚远离」……

original: This won't work. Try something else
translation: 这玩意不会奏效的。换个招吧

original: The cows balked in front of the gap and refused to take any step further. They had to be pushed into the gap and their miserable mooing mixed with the wailings of the tortured souls trapped in the pit until they hit the bottom.
translation: 小母牛们停在地缝前面，拒绝再向前迈动一步。它们注定被推进洞里，凄惨的的哀哞与怨灵的悲号合为一体，被困在深渊中，直到洞底。

original: I don't believe in this idea

Cartload after cartload of rocks and gravel were shoveled into the gap while the workers desperately tried to stay clear of the flames and fiery stones that seemed to increase in number. The screams of pain from the bottom of the pit affected the workers and some refused to keep shoveling in the gravel. I had to promise them no one was trapped down there but did not want anyone to descend into whatever madness the pit was.
translation: 工人们一边将一车又一车的石块和砂砾铲进地缝，另一边拼命地避开越来越多的火焰和灼热石块。洞底传来痛苦的尖啸侵袭着工人们，有些人拒绝再干活。我不得不对他们保证说洞里没有任何人被困，不管这洞有多疯狂，也不希望有人下洞去查看。
这是不可能完成的任务

original: One of the wise women told me she had a vision during the three days they were supposed to meditate on how to close the gap. She said the peril would be overcome only when I threw into the chasm what I held to be most dear, and I immediately thought of my eldest son. With a heavy heart I agreed to meet the wise woman at the pit together with my oldest son.
translation: 一个博学的妇人告诉我，说她在思考如何关闭地缝的三天里见到了一个异象。她说地洞的威胁只有在我将最最珍视的东西投入深渊才可解决，我马上就想到了我的长子。怀着沉重的悲痛，我同意带着我的长子与这妇人在洞边会面。

original: I hope I won't regret this
There must be some other way!
The gap finally closed! No more fiery stones and flames, no more wailing voices from the underground!
translation: 地洞终于被关上了！再也没有炽热的石块了，再也没有火焰了，再也没有地底传来的悲嚎了！

original: The priest did a fine job exorcising the Gate back to Hell!
translation: 牧师成功将魔鬼驱逐回了地狱！

original: The Gates of Hell closed after we fed it cattle!
translation: 献祭家畜之后，地狱之门关上了！

original: The Gates of Hell was filled in with stones!
translation: 地狱之门被石头填满了！

original: It took a human sacrifice but now the Gates of Hell is closed!
translation: 我实施了人祭，但地狱之门关上了！

original: Despite everything, the gap stubbornly refused to close and spewed even more fiery stones and wailing voices.
translation: 虽然我们用尽办法，但桀骜不驯的地缝就是不合上，而且吐出了更多灼热的石块和哀嚎声。

original: For Heaven's sake... what will I do now?
Intrigue skill is the primary attribute of the Spymaster. High Intrigue improves the chances of uncovering plots and carrying out skullduggery like assassinations.
translation: 密谋能力是间谍总管的主要属性。高密谋能力可提高发现阴谋和实施秘密行动（例如暗杀）的成功率。

original: With a Stewardship skill of §Y$VALUE$§W, §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§W is considered $DESC$ administrator. It also affects the maximum size of your demesne.
translation: 财政能力为§Y$VALUE$§W的§Y[GetTitledFirstName]§W被认为是$DESC$管理者。这也会影响你的最大直辖领地规模。

original: Kingdoms and Empires have access to a special set of laws called Crown Laws. These affect all de jure vassals, not just those who are de facto part of the realm. However, infidels and heretics outside the de facto realm remain unaffected.
translation: 王国和帝国拥有王权法。这不仅会影响该国事实上的封臣，还会影响法理上的封臣。但事实国土外的异端和异教徒不受影响。

original: My neighbor has quite probably the finest ass around, but then Jesus whispered to me that this was wrong.
translation: 我的邻居有着附近最性感的臀部，但是耶稣向我耳语说这样做是错误的。

original: Jesus is right, this is wrong
translation: 耶稣是对的，这样做是错的

original: For too long I have felt incomplete, that my spirit was somehow lacking. Then the voice reminded me that true fruit of the spirit was kindness.
translation: 我感到灵魂中缺少了什么东西已经很久了。突然一个声音提醒我道，灵魂的真谛在于和蔼。

original: For too long I have directed my anger towards those who dimply do not deserve it. Jesus whispered to me and reminded me that I should direct it those who had sinned.
translation: 我对那些并不值得我发怒的人倾泻怒火已经很久了。耶稣在我耳边低语道，我的怒火应该对那些罪人发泄。

original: I will be a true soldier of God
translation: 我会成为主的忠诚战士

original: I have been so quick to judge, I realize it now. The voice reminds me that I should seek what is good for all.
translation: 我终于意识到我下决断时太缺少思考了。一个声音提醒我，我应该顾全各方利益。

original: I am proud and I thought myself noble for I rejected all that was weak and insipid. Then the voice reminded me that I was rejecting God when I worshipped myself thus?
translation: 我骄傲自满，并因与一切不佳和平淡无奇的事物保持距离而自以为高贵。后来一个声音提醒我，当我尊崇自我时，我实际上是在疏远上帝。

original: Then I realized how wrong I was.
translation: 我意识到我错得多么离谱。

original: For too long I believed that it was the Greeks who would inherit the earth. Then Jesus whispered that is was simply a typo in my Bible and that in reality it was the meek.
translation: 长久以来，我一直在念「飘柔的人有福了，因为他们必承受地土」。接着耶稣在我耳边低语，那只是我的圣经上的一个抄写错误。原文是「温柔的人有福了，因为他们必承受地土」

original: Then I will be more meek

Jesus whispers have become more frantic of late. He is worried that Satan has corrupted his words through his agents at the various ecumenical councils. He has asked me to seek out the good news that Philip brought so that I can understand the true role of Mary.
translation: 耶稣的低语最近变得更加狂乱。他担心撒旦正在通过他人间各处的仆人篡改他的言辞。他吩咐我寻找传福音者腓力带来的福音，以使我理解圣母玛利亚的真正地位。

original: I will do as our Lord Commands
For too long I have felt powerless as our enemies advance, but lately Jesus has been promising me victories if only I can get commend.
translation: 我一直对敌人的进军深感无力，但是最近耶稣向我承诺，只要我献身于上帝，胜利就必属于我。

original: Lately Jesus has fallen silent over military matters. I feel somehow lessened because without the Lord who am I?
translation: 后来耶稣对军事问题沉默不语了。我感觉自己在变得渺小，离开了主我究竟是谁？

original: It must be a punishment for my sins
translation: 一定是对我罪行的惩罚

original: I felt the holy spirit fill me and just like the Apostles of yore I could speak in the tongues of many peoples, as the holy spirit gave me the power to express myself.
translation: 我感觉圣灵充盈我身，我说起别国的话来，正如昔日圣徒一般。好像圣灵赐给了我口才表达自我。

original: The only problem is no one else can
translation: 唯一的问题是：没有其他人可以做到

original: The holy spirit left me and I felt lessened. Some cynics commented that I was finally sober, but they did not understand what the true love of the Lord felt like.
translation: 圣灵离我而去，我感到虚弱无比。一些犬儒之徒认为我终于变得理性现实一些了，但他们根本无法理解我主真正的爱是什么感觉。

original: Your councillors cannot both lead troops and perform missions in counties.
translation: 你的内阁成员不能一边在外指挥部队，一边在领地执行任务

original: If you have no Spymaster, you cannot discover plots.
translation: 如果没有间谍总管，你就无法探得密谋

original: Sometimes the most skilled Councillor is also an enemy. Tread carefully.
translation: 有时最有才能的内阁成员亦最为危险。谨慎行事

original: You'll have better results plotting against your liege if you are the Spymaster.
translation: 如果你是间谍总管，你针对自己领主的密谋成功率更高

original: Use your Court Chaplain to convert the religion of counties and vassals.
translation: 使用你的宫廷司祭转化省份和封臣的信仰。

original: All your children will get claims on your titles.
translation: 所有的子嗣都会获得你头衔的宣称权

original: Delegate. A smaller group of direct vassals is easier to control.
translation: 分封少量直属封臣更为容易控制

original: Allies might refuse to participate in a war against someone they like more than you.
translation: 如果盟友喜欢你的敌人胜过你，他们可能拒绝参与你的战争

original: You can also build improvements in the Holdings of your direct vassals.
translation: 你可以在直属封臣的领地上修建建筑

original: Children tend to get the same traits and skills as their assigned guardian.
translation: 儿童往往会容易得到与其监护人相同的特质和技能

original: Just as Christians have Crusades, Muslims have Jihad.
translation: 就像基督徒可以发动十字军远征，穆斯林也可以发动吉哈德圣战

original: Nobles care about Prestige. Religious leaders care about Piety. Everyone cares for Gold.
translation: 贵族关注威望。宗教领袖关注虔诚。人人都关心金钱。

original: If an Antipope dethrones the reigning pope, he becomes the new Pope.
translation: 如果一位对立教宗推翻了现任教宗，他会成为新的教宗

original: I promised [From.GetBestName] that [From.GetSheHe] had a chance to become Marshal of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. Now [From.GetSheHe] is petitioning me again about it.
translation: 我向[From.GetBestName]承诺[From.GetSheHe]有机会成为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的军事总管。现在[From.GetSheHe]为此再次请求我。

original: I promised [From.GetBestName] that [From.GetSheHe] had a chance to become Spymaster of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. Now [From.GetSheHe] is petitioning me again about it.
translation: 我向[From.GetBestName]承诺[From.GetSheHe]有机会成为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的间谍总管。现在[From.GetSheHe]为此再次请求我。

original: I promised [From.GetBestName] that [From.GetSheHe] had a chance to become Steward of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. Now [From.GetSheHe] is petitioning me again about it.
translation: 我向[From.GetBestName]承诺[From.GetSheHe]有机会成为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的财政总管。现在[From.GetSheHe]为此再次请求我。

original: I promised [From.GetBestName] that [From.GetSheHe] had a chance to become [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. Now [From.GetSheHe] is petitioning me again about it.
translation: 我向[From.GetBestName]承诺[From.GetSheHe]有机会成为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]。现在[From.GetSheHe]为此再次请求我。

original: I promised [From.GetBestName] that [From.GetSheHe] had a chance to become [Root.GetChancellorName] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. Now [From.GetSheHe] is petitioning me again about it.
translation: 我向[From.GetBestName]承诺[From.GetSheHe]有机会成为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的[Root.GetChancellorName]。现在[From.GetSheHe]为此再次请求我。

original: Check the tooltips on the opinion number for some of your vassals. The opinions they have of you is based on a number of things, like personal diplomacy, free investiture, autonomy, and some personality traits will go better or worse together. If you are patient and your vassal is wroth, that does not make for a good relationship.
translation: 检查工具条上你的封臣的好感度数值。他们对你的好感由很多事情决定，比如个人外交能力，自主神职叙任权，王权等，另外个人特质之间的相性也会对你们之间的关系造成影响。如果你是耐心的人，而封臣是个易怒的人，你们的关系显然不会很好。

original: The opinion modifiers that are based on character traits are all permanent. Other things can change the opinions between characters affected by trait modifiers, but as long as the trait stays, so does the modifier. Then we have temporary modifiers of course.
translation: 基于角色特质的好感修正是永久的。其他因素可能改变角色之间的好感度，但是只要特质不改变，特质修正就不会消失。接下来我们会说明非永久的好感因素。

original: You do this by sending your chancellor to the province and fabricating a claim there. It will take a while, but you can try it in the basic war tutorial.
translation: 你派遣外交总管到这个省份伪造宣称权来实现这个目的。这会花费一定时间，但你可以在基础战争教程里尝试。

original: Below the portrait of your wife are two golden rings on blue background. This is a button that will allow you to arrange a marriage for the current character. Click it to continue.
translation: 在你妻子的头像下方有一个蓝底双金环的图标，这个按钮可以允许你为这个角色安排婚姻。点击继续。

original: Here you can see a list of unmarried women. Not all are appropriate of course. Some are too young, a real marriage will not start until both of you are over 16. Some are too old, you want them to be able to have your children. Some have nothing to offer you. To help you decide, there are buttons that can sort the list according to your desires. Click next to continue.
translation: 这里你能看到所有未婚女子的列表。不是所有人都适龄。有些女孩过于年幼，只有双方都满16岁以上才能正式结婚。有些人又太老，已经无法生育后代了。还有些人对你毫无用处。为帮助你决策，善用各种排序按钮。点击下一步继续。

original: Here you can see what effects this marriage will have on your prestige. You can also see that she will answer yes to your proposal, so just go ahead and send it.
translation: 这里你可以看到婚姻将对你的威望产生的影响。你也可以看到她会答应你的提议，所以发送请求吧。

original: As soon as the second troop arrives (you can hover over the troop to see when in the tooltip), select both of them by clicking on one side and dragging a box around them. You'll first need to close the army details screen to see them both. Now you have a merge button over the info screen for the two armies. Click that to create one bigger army.
translation: 等到第二支部队到达后（你可以在部队上悬停鼠标查看到达时间），用鼠标把两支部队圈起来。你首先需要关闭军队细节面板以看到他们。现在你能看到军队窗口上的合并按钮。点击以合并为一支更大的部队。

original: These troops are free to hire, but they only attack religious enemies, and they only exist around the time of crusades, so they are a bit limited. If you are defending against infidels or heretics, they have no maintenance cost either. Now, raise your personal levy and select it to continue.
translation: 这些部队可以免费雇佣，但只会攻击异教敌人，而且只在十字军期间出现，所以其作用有限。如果你在对抗异教徒或者异端的入侵，他们还不花费维护费。现在动员你的私人部队，然后选择它以继续。

original: My skin is glowing, my hair is always perfect and the opposite sex yearn for me to take notice of them. I have gained the §YFair§! trait.
translation: 我的皮肤闪闪发亮，发型永远完美，异性都渴望得到我的注意。我获得了§Y性感§!特质。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is such a humble vassal, giving me the honor of [From.GetHerHis] kill from the hunt. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a benefit to my rule, and [From.GetHerHis] humility is an example to us all.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]是如此谦逊的封臣，将狩猎中[From.GetHerHis]收获全部归功于我。[From.GetSheHeCap]对我的统治大有助益，[From.GetHerHis]谦逊是我们学习的榜样。

original: It was a mistake inviting The Jumping Jews of Jerusalem to the Summer Fair. They are jumping at different rhythms despite the rhythmic twang of a harp. They tirelessly keep jumping, jumping, jumping... until one of them loses his balance and falls towards his brothers, causing all of them to fall to the floor.
translation: 邀请耶路撒冷的犹太杂耍者参加夏季集市是个错误。他们按照不同的节拍蹦跳，尽管竖琴的旋律只有一个。他们不停地跳啊跳啊跳……直到他们中的一个人失去平衡，扑倒在他兄弟的身上，使他们全都栽倒在地。

original: I haven't grown as much as the other children and people tell me I'm a 'dwarf'. The other children found out and are mocking me, calling me goblin and pretend to be afraid when I come near them...
translation: 我长得不如同龄孩子那么高，别人告诉我我是个「矮人」。其他孩子那取笑我，管我叫小地精，并在我靠近他们的时候装作害怕我……

original: I will give them something to be afraid of!
I won't give them the pleasure of seeing me cry...
translation: 我不会给他们看见我哭泣，以此取乐……

original: Despite my small stature, I have gained the respect of my court. Until a Dwarf Troupe appeared at the castle gates and none of them were taller than me...
translation: 尽管我身材矮小，但我还是得到了我宫廷成员的尊重。直到一队矮人杂技团出现在城门口，他们没有人比我高……

original: I pity them, and refuse to have them perform
translation: 我同情他们，拒绝让他们表演

original: I let them perform, what harm can it do?
translation: 让他们表演，有什么危害呢

original: There's a dwarf at the court and, being the giant of a [Root.GetManWoman] that I am, people has been pestering me to test my strength by tossing the dwarf as far as I can.
translation: 宫廷中有个侏儒。作为一个[Root.GetManWoman]中的「巨人」，人们总是要求我通过能把侏儒扔多远来展示我的力量。

original: Before I knew it, [From.GetTitledFirstName] picked me up and tossed me away! Luckily for me, I landed in a haystack head-first and was not hurt badly although my temper took a bad turn for the worse...
translation: 在我反应过来之前，[From.GetTitledFirstName]把我举起来然后扔了出去！幸运的是，我头朝下栽进了一堆干草，没有受到严重的伤，但是我的心灵已经受伤严重了……

original: Are you insane or just an idiot?!
translation: 你疯了吗！还是你只是个白痴？！

original: I am usually so careful climbing down the narrow steps, what with my clubfoot making me clumsy and prone to fall down the stairs. Today, I wasn't as cautious as I should've been...
translation: 我平常都小心翼翼地下台阶，畸形的下肢总是使我步履维艰。今天，我不如以往那么小心……

original: I landed at the bottom of the steps, badly hurt...
translation: 我摔到了台阶底，受了重伤……

original: I cannot run around playing with the other children as much as I like because of my clubfoot, and the other children has started making fun of me. They dart towards me, gives me a small push and then run away giggling and shouting 'Catch me if you can!'...
translation: 我不能随心所欲和其他孩子一起玩，因为我下肢畸形，其他孩子也因此取笑我。他们朝我扔东西，轻轻推我，然后跑开，大笑着说「来抓我呀」……

original: Next time, my fist will redecorate their faces!
translation: 下次，我的拳头会给他们脸上化个妆！

original: I ignore them, hoping they will tire and go away
translation: 我无视他们，希望他们厌倦后散去

original: My clubfoot makes it hard for me to use a regular saddle, I need one with a custom-made stirrup that is big enough. Therefore I was much dismayed when someone had misplaced my special stirrup.
translation: 我畸形的下肢使我无法使用普通的马鞍，我需要一个带有特殊定做的大号马镫的鞍具。因此当有人弄错了我的马鞍时，我感到很沮丧。

original: Try to use a regular one

The new stirrup seemed to work fine, until my usually steady horse tried to throw me off by bucking and rearing. Finally it succeded, but because of the narrow stirrup my clubfoot got stuck and so I was dragged after the horse several yards before someone grabbed its reins and made it stop.
translation: 新马镫很不错，直到我平时温驯的马试图把我摔下去。最后它成功了，但是窄小的马镫挂住了我的畸形足，在有人勒住马的缰绳让它停下来之前，我已经被马拖者走了好几码远。

original: I fear my clubfoot hinders me from getting married! As I am not as graceful as the other women at court, I'd rather not dance or do anything too exhausting that will cost me my balance and make me a laughing stock.
translation: 我害怕我的畸形足会妨碍我结婚！我不如宫廷里的其他女人那样美丽，我最好不要跳舞，或是做任何会令我失去平衡摔倒在地而成为笑柄的事情。

original: Despite my clubfoot, I should take any chance to dance!
translation: 我就算下肢畸形也要跳舞！

original: I ask my father to look for a suitor!
translation: 我要让父亲给我找一个合适的人！

original: I should be content with what I have
translation: 我应该对我所拥有的感到满足

original: I am teased for my harelip, the other children tells me my mother must have looked at a hare's split lip when she was pregnant with me and wished for me to look the same.
translation: 我因我的兔唇而被欺负，其他孩子告诉我，我的母亲在怀着我的时候肯定是看着兔子分瓣的嘴唇，并希望我也生成那样。

original: I ignore them, their words hold no truth
translation: 我无视他们，他们嘴里说不出一句真话

original: I was talking to one of my vassals and was interrupted by a courtier. Trying to be courteous, I presented them to each other, only to mispronounce the vassal's name because of my harelip...
translation: 我正在和一位封臣说话，这时一个廷臣打断了我。处于礼貌，我为他们互相作了介绍，只是念错了封臣的名字，因为我的兔唇……

original: Shamed, I refuse to acknowledge the mispronunciation
translation: 耻辱，我拒绝承认念错了名字

original: I ask the vassal to forgive me

I mostly play the monster whenever the other children let me play with them. They say my hunchback makes me the perfect person for the monster part, and even if it hurts when they say that I still get to play with them, and that is usually good enough for me.
translation: 当其他孩子允许我和他们玩时，我总是在当魔鬼。他们说我的驼背使我非常适合扮演魔鬼。虽然这样的话很伤人，我还是得和他们一起玩，这对我来说已经满足了。

original: Not today, today I'll show you the real monster!
translation: 今天可不一样，今天我会告诉你什么是真正的魔鬼！

original: I think I must accept my role...
Who can love someone like me? The hunch on my back, my ugly face? I pray to [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] every chance I get to find me someone to love.
translation: 谁会爱上我这样的人？我佝偻的后背、丑陋的脸庞？我一直在向[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]祈祷，让我找到我的真爱。

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] cannot help me, only I can
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]帮不了我，只有我自己能帮自己

original: I walked slowly, no thoughts in my mind when someone ran into me from behind. We fell to the ground together and I grabbed the young woman instinctively, ready to defend myself from her scorn. Instead, she looked pleadingly at me and asked me to help her flee from the guards who had harassed her since she arrived in [Root.Location.GetName].
translation: 我一边发呆一边缓慢踱步，突然有人从后面撞上了我。我们一起跌倒在地，我本能地抓住了那个年轻女人，准备好听她对我的嘲笑。出人意料的是，她恳求地望着我，希望我帮助她摆脱从她来[Root.Location.GetName]起就一直纠缠着她的士兵。

original: I managed to save Hope, as the young woman's name was, from the guards and we spent the next few days together. She did not seem to notice my hunchback, only the man I am before it. It startled me when I realized I had begun to love her, my Hope in love...
translation: 我从士兵手中保护了望儿（那个年轻女人的名字），然后一起住了几天。她似乎没有注意我的驼背，只注视着我的内在。我惊奇地意识到我开始爱上她了，我的望儿，我爱情的希望……

original: But she cannot love someone like me!
translation: 但她不可能爱上我这样的人！

original: People are laughing at me, saying that my hunchback makes me less of a [Root.GetManWoman]!
translation: 人们嘲笑我，说我的驼背使我不像个[Root.GetManWoman]！

original: They do not know me, so why should I care?
translation: 他们不了解我，我为什么要担心？

original: The other children ask me to say words, giggles when I try to pronounce them without lisping but always fails and it makes me feel sick to my stomach. Why are they so mean to me?
translation: 其他孩子让我说话，在我努力清晰地拼出他们的名字却总是失败时嘲笑我，这使我内心痛苦。他们为什么要这样对我？

original: I don't want to play with them anymore

During my conversation with a vassal I tried to lisp as little as possible, but when a courtier came up to us and wanted me to introduce [Root.GetHerHimOpp] to the vassal I could barely make myself understood when I tried to pronounce the vassal's name.
translation: 在我和一位封臣的谈话中，我努力尽量发音清晰。但当一个廷臣加入我们，并希望我向封臣介绍[Root.GetHerHimOpp]时，我说出来的封臣的名字甚至连我自己都听不懂。

original: Lisp? Me? No, you must be wrong!
translation: 口齿不清？我？不，你肯定搞错了！
原谅我，我只是有些口齿不清

original: My lisp sometimes makes it hard for people to understand me, and when I become frustrated the lisp becomes worse, making it even harder to understand me.
translation: 我说话有时候口齿不清到别人很难听懂，而且当我因此感到沮丧的时候，这种情况会更加严重，别人也会更加难以理解我在说什么。

original: I won't let this control my life!
translation: 我不会允许它控制我的生活！

original: I must learn to live with this
I shall pray and hope my lisp disappear
translation: 我当祈祷我的口齿不清消失

original: The more upset I become, the more I stutter and the other children are well aware of this. Their taunting and pestering makes me sad but I cannot tell them that without stuttering which makes them laugh even more.
translation: 其他孩子都看出来我越是沮丧，我就越结巴。他们的嘲讽和欺负使我很伤心，但当我口吃着告诉他们这一点时，他们只是更加开怀大笑。

original: I'll hide from them so they will forget about me
I seldom stutter these days, unless I am upset, frustrated or excited. The more I try to force the words to leave my tongue the more I stutter and the more frustrated I get...
translation: 最近几天我很少口吃，除非我心情低落，灰心丧气或是过于激动。我越是强迫话语离开我的舌头，我就越是口吃，就越是灰心丧气……

original: I shall pray and hope my stutter will disappear
translation: 我应该祈祷我的口吃消失

original: I had managed to talk to speak to my vassal for several minutes without stuttering not even once! Then I got stuck on the vassal's name when I was supposed to present him to a courtier, not a word left my tongue. I had to let someone else present him...
translation: 我成功和一位封臣说了几分钟话，没有一次口吃！但当我要向一个廷臣介绍他时，封臣的名字卡在了我的嘴边，我一个字都说不出来了。我只好让另一个人介绍他……

original: Of course I did it deliberately!
I'm sorry, my stutter sometimes act up...
What? I cannot do everything, can I?
tHe otHeR cHildReN aRe MeaN to Me!
translation: 其、其他小、小孩欺、欺负我！

original: It must be a miracle, I no longer have problem pronouncing S or any other letter! I have lost the §YLisp§! trait.
translation: 这肯定是个奇迹，我发S和其他字母的音不再有困难了！我失去了§Y口吃§!特质。

original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! can afford the ransom of §Y$GOLD$§W gold
Send a gift of §Y$COST$§W¤ to §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!. §RThis will not increase [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you further.§!
translation: 送一份价值 §Y$COST$§W¤ 的礼物给§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!。§R但这不会更进一步增加[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]好感§!

original: This Dynasty does not have any living members, it does not have a head
translation: 这个家族没有在世的成员了，也没有家族领袖。

original: I'm having fun with it for now
They already have a contract with §Y$OWNER$§W.
You cannot afford the Cost of §R$GOLD$§!¤.
Resign and return to the Main Menu
translation: 放弃游戏并返回主菜单

original: This map mode shows all geographical and traditional ('de jure') empires.
translation: 该地图模式显示所有地理和传统（「法理」）上的帝国。

original: This map mode shows the income levels of the counties.
translation: 该地图模式显示各省份的收入水平。

original: This map mode shows the risk of a peasant uprising.
translation: 该地图模式显示农民叛乱的风险。

original: This map mode shows ruling dynasties.
translation: 该地图模式显示欧洲各大统治家族。

original: This map mode shows the opinions of other rulers toward the selected character.
translation: 该地图模式显示其他统治者对被选中者的好感。

original: The church had just gotten some very beautiful stained glass windows and as I and [From.GetTitledFirstName] contemplated the windows the priest approached us and asked what we thought about them. I had thought about the symbolism of the windows while [From.GetTitledFirstName] just repeated what I had said.
translation: 教堂装了一批非常美丽的彩色玻璃窗。当我和[From.GetTitledFirstName]注视着玻璃时，牧师走过来询问我们的感想。我谈论着窗户的象征作用，然后[From.GetTitledFirstName]只是重复了我的观点。

original: The guests have finally arrived! All is ready, the cooks have worked day and night preparing the food, and the castle has never looked lovelier.
translation: 客人终于来了！一切就绪，厨子日以继夜地准备了美食，城堡也装饰得光鲜亮丽。

original: The local nobles of [Root.Location.GetName] complain about too many peasants entering the city during the Summer Fair.
translation: [Root.Location.GetName]的当地贵族抱怨称，夏季集市中有太多农民涌入了城市。

original: Tell them to accept the peasants

Guards seized me and made me spill even more wine onto my now completely ruined garb. Without a word and deaf to my protests, they carried me to the dungeon of [From.GetTitledFirstName] and left me there.
translation: 卫兵抓住了我，使我手中的红酒彻底弄脏了我的衣服。对我的抗议一言不发，他们把我扔进了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的地牢。

original: Am I here because of a dead servant?!
translation: 我在这里的原因是那个死了的侍者！？

original: The cook and I did not really plan to humiliate [From.GetTitledFirstName], we only wanted [From.GetHerHim] to realize how [From.GetHerHis] paranoia made everybody's life more difficult than it should be.
translation: 我和厨子并非真的打算羞辱[From.GetTitledFirstName]，我们只想让[From.GetHerHim]意识到[From.GetHerHis]妄想症让每个人的生活都更难受了。

original: How can I ever reward you?
translation: 我应该怎么奖赏你才好？

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] realizes that [This.GetSheHe] is not invited to [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s banquette
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]意识到[This.GetSheHe]没有被邀请参加[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的宴会

original: You have been kicked by the host.

I rushed around trying to get everyone to work harder, not smarter to get everything ready for the banquette when the guests started to arrive. I waited impatiently for [From.GetTitledFirstName] but still did my best to make sure every guest felt welcome and found its designated place at my table.
translation: 我四处奔走督促每个人努力工作，在个人到达前准备好宴会的一切事项。我不耐烦地等待着[From.GetTitledFirstName]，一边尽力保证每一位客人感到舒适，最后来到我的桌前。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] told me how glad my invitation had made [From.GetHerHim]
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]告诉我[From.GetHerHim]接到我的邀请后有多受宠若惊

original: Receives a letter with my reply

My liege, my mission to [FromFrom.Location.GetName] has so far been a success! During my visit to the court of [From.GetBestName], I seem to have managed to make [From.GetHerHim] understand what a benevolent and peaceful ruler you really are and [From.GetSheHe] sends [From.GetHerHis] regards.

Your humble [Root.GetChancellorName],
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
我的领主，我在[FromFrom.Location.GetName]的任务取得了成功！在我拜访[From.GetBestName]的宫廷时，我成功使[From.GetHerHim]理解了您是多么优雅而爱好和平的君主。随后[From.GetSheHe]表达了[From.GetHerHis]敬意。

您谦卑的[Root.GetChancellorName]，
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I wonder if [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] does exist. Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows?
translation: 我怀疑[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]是否真实存在。[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]也许会知道？

original: Too low rank to request this
Either party must have a child of suitable age at court
translation: 双方都必须在宫廷中有适龄儿童

original: I gladly accept the Guardianship contract between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我很高兴同意[Root.GetTitledFirstName]与[New.GetTitledFirstName]成为监护人和被监护人的关系。

original: I fear that I cannot accept accept the Guardianship contract between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 恐怕我不能同意[Root.GetTitledFirstName]与[New.GetTitledFirstName]成为监护人和被监护人的关系。

original: To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Teutonic Order wishes to assist you in your valiant struggle against the pagans. By transfering a border County to the order, we will be able to establish a local presence and fight these heathens.
translation: 致伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，\n您的智慧和仁慈被广为传颂。条顿骑士团希望在您对抗原始宗教信徒的英勇斗争里助您一臂之力。只要您转让一个边境省份给骑士团，我们就能在这一地区获得立足点，以更好的对抗异教徒。

original: An intriguing idea, but not at this time...
Select a child to be tutored.
translation: 选择一名要接受教育的儿童。

original: Select a guardian from the court of §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W.
translation: 从§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W的宫廷中选择一位监护人。

original: Select a guardian from our court.
translation: 从我们的宫廷中选择一位监护人。

original: Select a child from our court.
translation: 从我们的宫廷中选择一名儿童。

original: Select a child from the court of §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W.
translation: 从§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W的宫廷中选择一名儿童。

original: §Y[AdultExtra.GetBestName]§W declined our proposal to be the new guardian for §Y[ChildExtra.GetBestName]§W.

We propose that [AdultExtra.GetBestName] become the guardian and mentor of little [ChildExtra.GetBestName], so [ChildExtra.GetSubjectPronoun] can be raised as a proper [AdultExtra.Culture.GetName] [AdultExtra.Religion.GetName].
translation: 我们提议[AdultExtra.GetBestName]成为小[ChildExtra.GetBestName]的监护人及导师，从而使[ChildExtra.GetSubjectPronoun]成为一名合格的[AdultExtra.Culture.GetName][AdultExtra.Religion.GetName]。

original: My prisoner [prisoner_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]'s spouse  [outside_spouse.GetTitledFirstName] sent me a letter insisting I would meet [outside_spouse.GetHerHim] in [outside_spouse.GetHerHis] keep. [outside_spouse.GetSheHeCap] asked me to show mercy and release [outside_spouse.GetHerHis] spouse for a hefty sum of money [outside_spouse.GetSheHe] obviously does not have.
translation: 我的囚犯[prisoner_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]的配偶[outside_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]给我写了一份信，坚持要我与[outside_spouse.GetHerHim]见上一面。[outside_spouse.GetSheHeCap]请求我发发慈悲看在钱的份上放了[outside_spouse.GetHerHis]配偶，但[outside_spouse.GetSheHe]显然没有那么多钱。

original: [outside_spouse.GetTitledFirstName] will be warned about the consequences of freeing [prisoner_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]
I have taken such pride in myself lately that my [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] noticed this and chided me about it.
translation: 近来我越发为自己感到骄傲，以至于[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]都注意到了这件事，并为此规谏我。

original: My [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName], is scared of the Wild Hunt!

The [Root.Religion.GetName] church's men are not always easy to deal with. I need to make sure that I have their blessing, and I have both my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and my [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName] giving me advice on how to earn their approval.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetName]教会的人不好打交道。我需要确保得到他们的保佑，我同时向我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]和我的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName]寻求如何获取他们信任的建议。

original: The friendship between me and a male courtier is very special, but I fear I might lose him if I cannot find a way to make my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] get rid of the old [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.Spouse.job_spiritual.GetFullName] and appoint my friend as [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] in his stead.
translation: 我和一位男性廷臣的关系非比寻常，但我害怕如果我不能找到让我的丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]辞退[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.Spouse.job_spiritual.GetFullName]，并任命我的朋友[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]接任的方法，我会失去他。

original: I have noticed [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s affection for one of the courtiers and heard her praise his [Player.Religion.GetPietyName], so it did not surprise me when she approached me and tried to convince me to appoint him as [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]. Trouble is, [Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName] is well respected and many would disapprove if I were to fulfill [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s wish.
translation: 我注意到[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]对一位廷臣的钟爱，也时常听到她盛赞其[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]，所以当她试图说服我任命他为新的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]时我毫不惊讶。问题在于，[Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName]德高望重，如果我满足[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]的愿望，很多人会表示不满。

original: I know [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.Spouse.job_spiritual.GetFullName] is well respected, many would disapprove and reproach my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFullName] if he chooses to appoint my friend as the [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], but I don't care. I need a friend at court!
translation: 我知道[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.Spouse.job_spiritual.GetFullName]德高望重，如果我的丈夫任命我的朋友为[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，很多人会表示不满并责备[Root.Spouse.GetFullName]。但是我才不管，我只是在宫廷中需要一个朋友！
好消息！我的朋友成为[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]了！

original: All courtiers will know that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] does not trust [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s distrust in me as [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetLordSpiritualName] has made everyone in court dislike me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不信任我，[From.GetHerHis][From.GetLordSpiritualName]使宫廷中每一个人都不喜欢我！

original: There is no [Root.job_spiritual.GetManWoman] better at increasing the Church's opinion of me or teach me to become a more pious [Root.GetManWoman] than my [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 这里没有比我的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]能够更好的提高教会对我的好感、或者是教导我成为一名更虔诚的[Root.job_spiritual.GetManWoman]人的人选了！

original: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] found a heretic at my court and insisted, nay, demanded that I would banish the heretic and make sure the heretic would never return on pain of death.
translation: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName][From.GetTitledFirstName]在我的宫廷中发现了一个异端，并建议我将其流放，使异端永远在死一般的痛苦中，无法回到家乡。

original: What good is my position as [From.GetLordSpiritualName] if my liege won't listen to me? The heretic did not burn on the stake despite my desperate demands to [From.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 如果领主对我的话置若罔闻，我当[From.GetLordSpiritualName]有什么好处？尽管我百般恳求[From.GetTitledFirstName]，异端还是没有被烧死在火刑柱上。

original: My liege, I am pleased to report the success of my mission to [From.Location.GetName]. The majority of the population have been converted to the [From.Religion.GetName] faith!\nYour humble [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 我的领主，很荣幸告诉您我在[From.Location.GetName]的任务大获成功。当地的大部分人民都皈依了[From.Religion.GetName]！\n您谦卑的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，\n[From.GetTitledName]

original:
My liege, I am pleased to report that your errant subject, [From.GetTitledName], has converted to the [From.Religion.GetName] faith. Praise [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!

Your humble [Root.GetLordSpiritualName],
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，我要向您报告一个好消息，您误入歧途的臣民[From.GetTitledName]已经皈依了[From.Religion.GetName]。赞美[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]！

您谦卑的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]

original:
My liege, after being convinced by the [From.GetLordSpiritualName] from another county, I have decided to convert to the [From.Religion.GetName] faith!

Your humble servant,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，我已被别省的[From.GetLordSpiritualName]说服，皈依了[From.Religion.GetName]！

您谦卑的仆人，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: [Root.GetTitledName], your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [From.GetTitledName] was killed by heathens when trying to spread the Holy Faith in [From.Location.GetName].
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]，您的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][From.GetTitledName]在[From.Location.GetName]传播神圣的信仰时，被异教徒杀害。

original: Send a letter to [From.Host.GetTitledName] explaining [From.Host.GetHerHis] [From.GetLordSpiritualName]'s mistake
A chastising letter is sent to the [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]
translation: 一封督责的信被送给了[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]

original: A complimentary letter is sent to the [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]
translation: 一封赞美的信被送给了[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]

original: My [Root.GetTitle], I ask for your forgiveness as a pious [From.Religion.GetName]! My [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]'s precipitous conclusion will no longer cause you any more grievance as I personally will make sure your [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] will be known as a fact and not a question.\nYour humble [From.GetTitle],\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，作为一名虔诚的[From.Religion.GetName]，我请求您的原谅！我的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]的武断结论不会再使你蒙受冤屈，我将会以个人名义保证你的[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]真实不虚。\n您谦卑的[From.GetTitle]，\n[From.GetTitledName]

original:
My [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], the evidence you presented against the noble is convincing and robust enough, there is no doubt in my mind that you have found a real heretic. A work well done!

Your humble [From.GetTitle],
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，你展示的证据充足而令人信服，你毫无疑问找到了一个真正的异端。干得好！

您谦卑的[From.GetTitle]，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: News of unrest in [From.Location.GetName]! The [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] of [From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has been trying to root out heresy and convert the population, but the peasants have been resisting and are now arming themselves.
translation: 动荡的[From.Location.GetName]传来消息！[From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]正在试图铲除异端并转化当地信仰，但是不满的农民揭竿而起了。

original:
My liege, I write to you with bad news from [From.Location.GetName]. My efforts to root out heresy and convert the population have met with resistance, and the peasants are arming themselves. I fear we might have a revolt on our hands here soon.

Your humble [Root.GetLordSpiritualName],
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，我不得不向您汇报[From.Location.GetName]的坏消息。我根除异端，使当地人民皈依的努力遭到了挫折，农民正在武装自己。恐怕我们将很快面对一场叛乱。

您谦卑的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
My liege, I have good news from my mission to [From.Location.GetName]! During my visit to the court of [From.GetBestName], I have filled [From.GetHerHis] ears with poisonous slander and evil rumors about [From.GetHerHis] spiritual leader. Their relation has been thoroughly sabotaged and I foresee that it is going to be anything but good from now on.

Your humble [Root.GetLordSpiritualName],
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，我有一个来自[From.Location.GetName]的好消息！在我拜访[From.GetBestName]的宫廷时，我成功使[From.GetHerHis]耳朵里充满关于[From.GetHerHis]宗教领袖的恶毒流言。他们的关系被彻底破坏，可以预料到未来绝对没有好事会发生。

您谦卑的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]

original:
My liege, during my stay in [From.Location.GetName] I have found a great philosopher who has agreed to help me with my studies to enhance culture in the county. With your permission I would suggest that we employ him.

Your humble [Root.GetLordSpiritualName],
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，待在[From.Location.GetName]的时候我发现了一个大哲学家，他同意帮助我们在省份内加强文化建设。一经您的允许我就会雇用他。

您谦卑的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: It is sad that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is employing [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] as [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]. I am more competent and would be a better [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]!
translation: 很遗憾[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]正在委任[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]为[Root.Liege.GetHerHis][Root.GetLordSpiritualName]。我更胜任这个职位，将会成为更好的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]！

original: [From.GetBestName] claims that [From.GetSheHe] would be a better [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] than [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName], and petitions that [From.GetSheHe] should be given the title of [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].
translation: [From.GetBestName]宣布[From.GetSheHe]将成为比[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]更好的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，提议[From.GetSheHe]应该被授予[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]一职。

original: My liege [From.GetBestName] is not entirely happy with our performance as [From.GetLordSpiritualName] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], and is considering our replacement..
translation: 我的领主[From.GetBestName]不太满意我作为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的[From.GetLordSpiritualName]的表现，正在考虑撤换我……

original: Enough time has passed, I deserve to become [Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], and [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] will make me it!
translation: 已过了足够的时间了，我理应成为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的[Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName]，[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]将任命我！

original:
My dear and trustworthy [This.GetBestName].
I hereby grant you the title as [From.GetLordSpiritualName] of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

[From.GetBestName]
translation:
我亲爱的值得信赖的[This.GetBestName]，
我任命你为[From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的[From.GetLordSpiritualName]。

[From.GetBestName]

original:
My [Root.GetTitle], the more I study the [From.Religion.GetName] religion the more I feel compelled to embrace it and to show you the wisdom that lies in these texts. I have sent you excerpts from the most interesting parts... ...I urge you to follow my example and embrace the [From.Religion.GetName] religion.

Your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName],
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，我对[From.Religion.GetName]的研习越深，我越感觉应该投奔它的怀抱，并向您展示它的典籍中深藏的智慧。我随信附上了最有趣部分的一些节选……我敦促您跟随我的脚步，皈依[From.Religion.GetName]。

您的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
My liege, my mission to [FromFrom.Location.GetName] has so far been a success! During my visit to the court of [From.GetBestName], I seem to have managed to make [From.GetHerHim] understand what a benevolent and pious ruler you really are and [From.GetSheHe] sends [From.GetHerHis] regards.

Your humble [Root.GetLordSpiritualName],
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，我在[FromFrom.Location.GetName]的任务目前为止大获成功！在我拜访[From.GetBestName]的宫廷时，我成功使[From.GetHerHim]理解您是多么优雅而爱好和平的君主。随后[From.GetSheHe]表达了[From.GetHerHis]敬意。

您谦卑的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]

original: My liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName], is in deep financial trouble. As my coffers are filled, this seems like a golden opportunity to acquire more land.
translation: 我的领主，[Root.Liege.GetTitledName]正深陷财政危机。考虑到我们国库充盈，这似乎是一个扩张领土的绝佳机会。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has recognized the dire financial situation I am in. [From.GetSheHeCap] has sent me an offer to buy some land of mine.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]察觉到了我正深陷财政危机。[From.GetSheHeCap]希望购买我的一些领地。

original: The land belongs to the crown.
Send a letter to the Pope in the hope of getting our sins forgiven and increasing our piety.
translation: 向教宗写信，祈求宽恕我们的罪孽，并提高我们的虔诚。

original:
For too long, the crown has restricted our historic rights and liberties. The time has come to Lower Crown Authority! With your regent, [Root.Regent.GetTitledName], among my supporters you have no other choice than to accept.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
王权已经限制我们的权利和自由太久，是时候降低王权了！在我的支持者面前，你和你的摄政[Root.Regent.GetTitledName]别无选择只能接受。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: My slothfulness gets me into trouble with my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] who claims I do not do a good enough job as a [Root.Liege.GetChancellorName] as I 'go to extreme lengths to avoid having to do any actual work'. [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s words, not mine.
translation: 我的懒惰使我陷入了麻烦，我的领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]认为我不是称职的[Root.Liege.GetChancellorName]，因为我尽最大的可能避免做实际工作。[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]是这么认为的，虽然我不这样认为。

original: I grow more and more impatient with [Root.GetChancellorName] [From.GetTitledFirstName], [From.GetHerHis] slothfulness makes [From.GetHerHim] go to extreme lengths to avoid having to do any actual work.
translation: 我对[Root.GetChancellorName][From.GetTitledFirstName]越来越不耐烦，[From.GetHerHis]懒惰使[From.GetHerHim]尽最大的可能避免做实际工作。

original: I will give [From.GetHerHim] one last chance to sharpen up!
translation: 我会给[From.GetHerHim]最后一个机会振作起来！

original: The Hedge Knights have participated in a minor tournament together with our knights in [Root.Location.GetName]. Sadly, one of those landless vagabonds has been severly injured.
translation: 一队流浪骑士与我们的骑士一起参加了在[Root.Location.GetName]举办的一场小型比武大会。不幸的是，一个流浪骑士受了重伤。

original:
My liege, I have bad news from [FromFrom.Location.GetName]. My attempts to increase the county levy has met with nothing but failure and the reason behind this is [From.GetTitledName]! [From.GetSheHeCap] has been nothing but trouble since I arrived and has used [From.GetHerHis] wide influence in [FromFrom.Location.GetName] to hinder all my initiatives.

Your humble [Root.GetMarshalName],
[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
我的领主，我有来自[FromFrom.Location.GetName]的坏消息。我增加该省份征召军的尝试均以失败告终，而这一状况背后的原因正是[From.GetTitledName]！[From.GetSheHeCap]自我到达此地以来就只会捣乱，并利用[From.GetHerHis]广泛影响力在[FromFrom.Location.GetName]阻碍我的所有行动。

你谦卑的[Root.GetMarshalName]，
[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]
